body: The commanders of hobgoblin armies are among the most formidable warriors and military tacticians the world over.
name: Hobgoblin Commander

sections.ac: 24, touch 11, flat-footed 24 (+9 armor, +1 deflection, +1 natural, +3 shield)
sections.melee: +1 shock katana +18/+13/+8 (1d8+4/15-20 plus 1d6 electricity) or mwk naginata +17/+12/+7 (1d8+4/×4)
sections.other_gear: +2 iron lamellar, +1 heavy steel shield, +1 shock katana, mwk composite shortbow (+3 Str) with 10 arrows, mwk naginata, amulet of natural armor +1, cloak of resistance +2, ring of protection +1, 201 gp
sections.feats: Chain Challenge*, Improved Critical (katana), Improved Initiative, Iron Will, Mounted Archery, Mounted Combat, Toughness, Vital Strike, Weapon Focus (katana)

sections.body: During Combat The commander challenges an enemy leader and fires flaming burst arrows from horseback until the initial target is dead, then uses Chain Challenge to challenge another.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.special_qualities: mount (horse), mounted archer, order of the warrior (honor in all things 3/day, way of the samurai), weapon expertise (katana)
sections.name: Hobgoblin Commander
sections.skills: Diplomacy +18, Handle Animal +18, Intimidate +18, Knowledge (history) +17, Ride +9, Stealth -3
sections.combat_gear: +1 flaming burst arrows  (8), potion of cure serious wounds

sections.ac: 28, touch 12, flat-footed 25 (+4 armor, +3 Dex, +12 natural, -1 size)
sections.feats: Diehard, Endurance, Iron Will, Light Armor Proficiency, Power Attack, Run, Toughness
sections.special_qualities: combat trained, tricks (attack, come, defend, down, fetch, guard, heel, seek, stay, track, work)
sections.name: Commander's Warhorse
